'''18w43b''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on October 24, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w43b|October 24, 2018}}</ref>, which fixes bugs in [[18w43a]].

== Changes ==
'''Items'''
[[File:Bucket of Cod.png|32px]] [[File:Bucket of Salmon.png|32px]] [[File:Bucket of Tropical Fish.png|32px]] [[File:Bucket of Pufferfish.png|32px]] [[File:Pufferfish (item) JE5 BE2.png|32px]]

* Changed textures of Bucket of Fishes and Pufferfish.

'''Effects'''
[[File:Speed JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[File:Slowness JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[File:Haste JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Mining Fatigue JE3 BE2.png|36px]] {{darkbg|[[File:Strength (texture) JE3 BE2.png|32px]]}} [[File:Regeneration JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[File:Weakness JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[File:Poison JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[File:Slow Falling JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Conduit Power JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Dolphin's Grace JE1.png|32px]]

* Removed the background and fixed some incorrect textures.

'''General'''
* Cleaned up memory leaks in the client.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=18w43b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|117030|Forest ground too dark when pillaring up
|117094|Bright spots below {{cmd|fill}}-ed platform
|124241|{{code|Score}} and {{code|Selector}} text components finalize with the result of the first instance the command runs as.
|;prev
|137443|A few effect icons are swapped/missing.
|137454|Opening Loom GUI doesn't darken surrounding background.
|137457|Crash upon opening the F3 menu.
|137492|Spruce trees drop leaves instead of saplings.
|137530|Inserted text for {{code|%s}} in a translation string shows '{{code|null}}'.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This snapshot, being the second for 1.14, was released in the same week of the year as the second snapshot of the previous major update, [[17w43b]].
* As with [[18w43a]], 18w43b was released exactly 6 years after the [https://bugs.mojang.com Minecraft issue tracker].
